rationale: Encrypted Tablespaces requires a license for Oracle Advanced Security to use.
recommended_action: Do not create encrypted tablespaces. To decrypt a tablespace: https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/12.2/asoag/configuring-transparent-data-encryption.html#GUID-68BAB7C8-2757-4513-BE78-CA251C27B65F
error_message: Encrypted Tablespaces is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Security
